alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued September 01 at 10:04AM AKDT until September 02 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Large breaking will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until midnight AKDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach may wash away. Debris may wash up onto the beach. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds gusting to 40 mph will continue into tonight. The highest surf and worst conditions will along west facing shores such as near Shaktoolik and Unalakleet. Winds and surf will decrease late tonight.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
